DOC.brief_summary: This project comprehensive study , main focus motor control , compare patient chronic fatigue syndrome / myalgic encephalopathy ( CFS/ME ) and/or fibromyalgia syndrome ( FMS ) . Focus present project detail movement analysis movement laboratory involve functional task walk stand . Investigations also comprise muscle activity , reaction time fine motor control .
